name: InstEbooks
tag_list: ebook, mobile, photo, android, publishing, self-publishing, lifestyle
overview:
InstEbooks is a next generation lifestyle, interest, and event eBook publishing platform for self-publishing from Android devices.

Instebooks helps people capture, document, and publish their passions, interests, and events from their Android device. A next generation publishing platform, InstEbooks enables self publishing of photo centric eBooks. InstEbooks offers a wide range of customized, purpose built eBook Publishing apps to suit almost any interest and need. InstEbooks Unlimited is a general publishing tool that allows people to publish as many photo eBooks as they like in the standard ePub format. Rapidly create eBooks from Android devices using the latest Smartphone technologies such as swipe, speech to text, and emailing published books right from device.

Just as generations have enjoyed personal photo books on their bookshelves alongside professionally generated content, people will come to expect and enjoy personal photo ebooks as 1 way of enjoying photo compilations. Ebooks offer exciting enhancements to the printed photo book, such as narrated captions and maps.

milestones.source_description: Now Everyone is an Author: Publishing eBooks from Mobile Phones
